text:
- So Siemens is a leader
in the industrial space.
And what we're doing actively right now

is helping our customers
become digital enterprises
and create digital businesses
that they can serve their customers with.
So making our software
and tools more accessible, more scalable,

more flexible is really
where our collaboration

with AWS has been really
transformational to our business
and to the business of our customers.

One area where we are
collaborating heavily

with AWS is to make
sure the time to deploy

and the time to value is
significantly decreased.
We did a lot of due diligence in choosing

which cloud service provider
we wanted to collaborate with.
And some of the key considerations for us
were global access, security, flexibility,
and reliability, and resilience

in the solutions we
provide because our tools

are really mission
critical for our customers.

Evaluating those factors,
AWS was a clear choice.

So the collaboration
between Siemens and AWS

is really taking our
customers that much closer

to much more seamless
IT/OT operational model
and enabling their businesses
to operate more smoothly

through this IT/OT
convergence that's happening.
(upbeat music)
